escpos.barcode

Class BarCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • escpos.barcode.BarCode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class BarCode
extends java.lang.Object
implements EscPosConst, BarCodeWrapperInterface
    Supply ESC/POS BarCode commands

      • setBarCodeSize

        public BarCode setBarCodeSize(int width,
                              int height)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Set bar-code size.

        ASCII GS w n

        Parameters:
        width - codes for widths of the module, the width of module depends of printer model.
        height - height of a bar code in dots.
        Returns:
        this object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when this condition is not true: 2 ≤ width ≤ 6, 68 ≤ width ≤ 76
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when this condition is not true: 1 ≤ height ≤ 255
        See Also:
        getBytes(java.lang.String)

      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes(java.lang.String data)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        BarCode Assembly into ESC/POS bytes.

        Set bar code height

        ASCII GS h n

        Set bar code width

        ASCII GS w n

        Select print position of Human Readable Interpretation (HRI) characters

        ASCII GS H n Select font for HRI characters

        ASCII GS f n Select justification

        ASCII ESC a n

        print BarCode

        ASCII GS k m d1 ... dk

        Specified by:
        getBytes in interface BarCodeWrapperInterface
        Parameters:
        data - to be printed in bar-code
        Returns:
        bytes of ESC/POS commands to print the bar-code
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when data do no match with regex.
